extendedInfo.description: Ranked in Portugal (#2) Australia (#13) Brazil (#6) Italia (#16) Norway (#5) South Africa (#3) Spain (#16) Rip Curl presents its official live surfing events application for Rip Curl Pro on the ASP World Tour. Key Features: â Event Status Stay up-to-date with the event status of each Rip Curl Pro, including event start time, surf report and forecast. â Live Video (WiFi and 3G) Live video from all Rip Curl Pro events, including live commentary and graphics. â Video Exclusive video-on-demand includes Daily Highlights, Heats Highlights â Live Scores LIVE real-time scoring updates from all Rip Curl Pro events. â News Latest news updates from all Rip Curl Pro events. â Photos Latest photos from all Rip Curl Pro events. â Surfers Photos and biographies for the ASP World Tour surfers â Twitter Follow @ripcurlpro and join the conversation via Twitter â Push Notifications Be alerted when the Rip Curl Pro starts and ends. â Extras! Stay tuned for some extra goodies along the way ** While you're browsing for apps, be sure to check out the Rip Curl "Live The Search" Surfing Game ** www.live.ripcurl.com www.ripcurl.com

reviews.title: Shocking app
reviews.comment: When you try to connect to live video it states error. When you connect to live scores the whole app crashes. This is the worst appi have ever downloaded.
reviews.author: Dougall Pennefather

reviews.title: less than zero!
reviews.comment: cuantos miles de observadores del evento se lo perdieron? tanta expectativa y nada sucedio! tan dificil poner a trabajar a tu media group hacer un patch y mandar aviso de actualizacion? suerte y que lo disfruten solo en mr jobs plataforms! wait for the bad publicity!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beyond disappointing
reviews.comment: Why force feed us an app that clearly never worked?  I wouldn\'t even be here if the website stream was working.  The potential is there.  Get it together Ripcurl.
reviews.author: David Milaszewicz

reviews.title: Even the few features that do work are poorly implemented...
reviews.comment: For example, the image gallery: no screen rotate, and no pinch zoom. I\'m only looking at the image gallery because the video doesn\'t work!  Plenty more similar examples to be found throughout...
reviews.author: Miles Tillinger

reviews.title: Don\'t bother...
reviews.comment: Live video doesn\'t work at all, Bad layout for the results, bad responsiveness. Appart from the news, it\'s pretty useless. Uninstalling... Stick to the website.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hi
reviews.comment: This app is dreadful I shld of stuck with iphone..no dramas there !!
reviews.author: Matty Jungblut

reviews.title: Virtually Useless
reviews.comment: Live stream fails, shows an event as being on when it clearly isn\'t. Scores etc work but without live stream the app is not worth having.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Shite
reviews.comment: Live stream fail fail error error...get it together....21 century
reviews.author: Bradley Fernihough

reviews.title: Why bother?
reviews.comment: You get the app for the live stream. And it DOESNT work. Why even make this app available? Losers..

reviews.title: Live feed does not work
reviews.comment: The only thing that I care about is the live streaming and it doesn\'t work at all
